title: Wall Facing, ca. 1725
description: Horizontal rectangle.  Thirty-seven tiles wide and twenty-one high with opening for door or window nineteen and one-half tiles high and twelve wide.  To left and right of opening, centered canopy above. Left, woman representing Hope, right, a sculputure urn.  Centered above opening, a mascaron.  Arabesque design of foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Wall Facing, ca. 1725.
ca. 1725. Tin-glazed earthenware, underglaze. Gift of William Randolph Hearst. 1926-43-5-487.
